bibl.title: Naukratis. Trade in Archaic Greece. (Oxford Monographs on Classical Archaeology.)
bibl.note: Diss. Univ. Berlin, 1990. - I. Introduction. - II. Karl Polanyi's Anthropological Theory of Economy. - III. Egypt under the Saite Dynasty. - IV. The Greek Economy and Its Market Elements. - V. The Archaeological Material from Naukratis. - VI. Naukratis as 'Port of Trade'. - Appendix. Selected Bibliography. Index.
bibl.seg: MÖLLER Astrid, Naukratis. Trade in Archaic Greece. (Oxford Monographs on Classical Archaeology.)
Oxford, Oxford University Press, 2000, 8°, xvii-290 pp. et 14 pll. et plans. ISBN 0-19-815284-1. £55.

Diss. Univ. Berlin, 1990. - I. Introduction. - II. Karl Polanyi's Anthropological Theory of Economy. - III. Egypt under the Saite Dynasty. - IV. The Greek Economy and Its Market Elements. - V. The Archaeological Material from Naukratis. - VI. Naukratis as 'Port of Trade'. - Appendix. Selected Bibliography. Index.
S.E.G. L, 1610; LII, 1791 (C.R. par Alain Bresson).
C.R. par Jan Paul Crielaard, Gnomon 77 (2005) pp. 31-37. - Véronique Dasen, MusHelv 59 (2002) pp. 191-192. - Kveta Smoláriková, AO 70 (2002) pp. 437-439. - Alain Bresson, REA 104 (2002) pp. 496-505.
